00018 import sys
00019 
00020 import getopt
00021 import math
00022 import os
00023 
00024 xvalues = []
00025 yvalues = []
00026 
00027 
00028 
00029 outfile = ""
00030 
00031 doresample =False
00032 dosmoothtorho_0 = False
00033 dowritedpotf = False
00034 
00035 #TODO hardcoded weight function
00036 def weight(x):
00037     c = math.cos(math.pi/(2*(xstop-xstart)*0.1)*x)
00038     return c*c
00039 
00040 
00041 options = ["xstart=", "xstop=", "infile=", "outfile=","help"]
00042 
00043 try:
00044     opts, args = getopt.getopt(sys.argv[1:], "", options)
00045 except getopt.GetoptError, err:
00046     # print help information and exit:
00047     print str(err) # will print something like "option -a not recognized"
00048     print options
00049     sys.exit(2)
00050 for o, a in opts:
00051     if o == "--help":
00052       print """%(name)s, version %(ver)s 
00053 This script smooths the border for thermodynamic force iteration
00054 
00055 Usage: %(name)s 
00056 Allowed options:
00057     --xstart     X.X  where the smoothing starts
00058     --xstop      X.X  where the smoothing stops
00059     --infile    FILE  input file
00060     --outfile   FILE  output file
00061 """ % {'name': os.path.basename(sys.argv[0]),'ver': '%version%'}
00062       sys.exit(0)
00063     elif o == "-v":
00064         verbose = True
00065     elif o == "--xstart":
00066         xstart = float(a)
00067     elif o == "--xstop":
00068         xstop = float(a)
00069     elif o in ("--infile"):
00070         infile = a
00071     elif o in ("--outfile"):
00072         outfile = a
00073     else:
00074         print options
00075         assert False, "unhandled option"
00076 
00077 for line in open(infile,"r").readlines():
00078         if line[0] != "@" and line[0] != "#":
00079                 values = line.split()
00080                 if float(values[0]) >= xstart and float(values[0]) <= xstop:
00081                         xvalues.append(float(values[0]))
00082                         yvalues.append(float(values[1]))
00083 
00084 
00085         
00086         
00087 f = open(outfile,"w")
00088 
00089 
00090 i = 0
00091 tempx = []
00092 tempy = []
00093 for x in xvalues:
00094     tempx.append (x)
00095     if x-xstart < 0.1*(xstop-xstart): 
00096 
00097         tempy.append ((1-weight(math.fabs(x-xstart)))*yvalues[i])
00098     elif x-xstart > 0.9*(xstop-xstart): 
00099 
00100         tempy.append ((1-weight(math.fabs(xstop-x)))*yvalues[i])
00101     else:
00102         tempy.append(yvalues[i])
00103     i=i+1
00104 
00105 i = 0
00106 for x in tempx:
00107     f.write('%15.10e %15.10e i\n' % (x, tempy[i]))
00108     i=i+1
